item.description:
Good Morning Packers,

We suffered a tough loss to the Giants on Sunday night but what better way to bounce back than hammer the vikings this Sunday, I have got my ass in gear early this week to send out the “meetup’ so because of the importance of this game the 2nd floor will be open from 11.30am, PLEASE get here early if you want a table or seat, if you get in late we will gladly accommodate any overflow on the 1st floor, the 1pm games have been quite busy so this week should be great, as usual Packers any suggestions or comments are welcome or email me at ray@bansheeboston.com

Have a great week and GO PACK.

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: vikings @ THE PACKERS
